auth_sentence.content: It acts by interfering with vitamin K which is vital for blood clotting and the manufacture of prothrombin in the body.
auth_sentence.res_content: It acts by interfering with vitamin K which is vital for blood clotting and the manufacture of prothrombin in the body.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It acts by interfering with vitamin K which is vital for blood clotting and the manufacture of prothrombin in the body.

auth_sentence.content: Vitamin K, coupled with prothrombin, causes blood coagulation, which is important in any surgical procedure.
auth_sentence.res_content: Vitamin K, coupled with prothrombin, causes blood coagulation, which is important in any surgical procedure.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Vitamin K, coupled with prothrombin, causes blood coagulation, which is important in any surgical procedure.

auth_sentence.content: If vitamin K is deficient, there will be a prothrombin deficiency and hemorrhaging may occur.
auth_sentence.res_content: If vitamin K is deficient, there will be a prothrombin deficiency and hemorrhaging may occur.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If vitamin K is deficient, there will be a prothrombin deficiency and hemorrhaging may occur.
